results.text_title: Desarrolladora Fullstack dedicada a crear soluciones web impactantes y funcionales con experiencia en HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, C#, Java, Flutter, librerias como React o Frameworks como Laravel me enfoco en desarrollar experiencias digitales que sean intuitivas y eficientes. Mi pasión por el diseño UX/UI y la optimización me impulsa a siempre entregar proyectos que no solo cumplan su propósito, sino también sean óptimas y esteticamente increibles.
results.text_tech:
• Tecnologías de Desarrollo:
    • Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TailwindCSS, SASS
    • Backend: PHP, C#, .NET, Java, Node.js, Flutter
    • Bases de Datos: SQL, MySQL, NoSQL (MongoDB)
    • Frameworks y Librerías: Laravel, React.js, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS
    • APIs: RESTful APIs, Integración de API en tiempo real
    • Diseño y Experiencia de Usuario(UX|UI): Metodología Mobile First, Diseño web Responsivo, investigación de Usuarios y desarrollo de productos, testing para UX/li>
results.projectstext: Clickea las imágenes para mayor información

results.text_title:
Hello, I’m Leyla Isolina Carmona Morales.
I’m a web developer with a solid foundation in designing and developing digital solutions. My passion and specialty lie in creating interactive and visually appealing web experiences that not only meet aesthetic standards but are also practical and accessible for users. Throughout my professional development, I’ve been involved in several projects that have helped strengthen my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Java, as well as frameworks and technologies like React, Laravel, and I am always willing to learn whatever is needed at the moment. I have experience in database management and using design tools such as Figma and Photoshop, and my goal is to continue growing as a professional in programming, contributing my creativity, attention to detail, and ability to quickly learn new technologies.
results.text_tech:
TECHNICAL:

  • ➔ Development: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Java, React, SASS, Tailwind, Bootstrap, Bulma

  • ➔ Responsive Design: Mobile First Implementation, Media Queries, and Flexbox.

  • ➔ Design Tools: Photoshop, Figma, UX/UI design, and responsive design.

SOFT SKILLS

  • ➔ Attention to detail and precision in design to code

  • ➔ Creative, analytical thinking, and teamwork.
